General.Name: Gemvaxzio Co. Ltd
General.Description: Flask Co., Ltd. engages in the interior construction business in South Korea and Asia. It operates through Energy, Interior Architecture, and Rental Business segments. The company engages in the interior design and construction, furniture design, and architectural design and construction businesses, as well as fabrication, manufacturing, and installation activities for facilities, Apm, department stores, starfield, COEX, hotels, resorts, shopping centers, offices, factory facilities, shared offices, and corporate office spaces. It also supplies renewable energy devices and facilities. In addition, the company designs, manufactures, and sells semiconductor ICs and related accessories; and invests in real estate properties. The company was formerly known as Gemvaxzio Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Flask Co., Ltd. in March 2022. Flask Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
